articles.title: CDC: More than 5M have skipped second dose of coronavirus vaccine - YourErie
articles.description: More than 5 million Americans have skipped out on their second dose of the COVID-19 vaccine, according to The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
articles.content:
MIAMI (NewsNation Now) More than 5 million Americans have skipped out on their second dose of the COVID-19 vaccine, according to The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
